name: Starry Eyed
description:
It's been a while since you've had a warm, wholesome Father and Daughter bonding experience.
You decide to take your daughter out to go stargazing. You two lie down on a field and look up into a starry sky.

However, the stars are all so different in sizes.
To capture the perfect night sky, while your daughter is looking away, you need to change the star sizes so that the sky is filled with consistently sized stars.

Do this by holding down the bigger stars until they pop into a cluster of smaller stars.
Be quick though, you only have so much time before she notices!

Please also check out these talented people who helped bring this game into fruition!
Artist: Kirsten Yiannis
Audio: Minh Ta
